metadata.header_path: /FORM 10-K/Part II/Item 8 - Financial Statements and Supplementary Data/NOTES TO CONSOLIDATED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS/Note 1 â€” DESCRIPTION OF BUSINESS, ACCOUNTING POLICIES, AND SUPPLEMENTAL DISCLOSURES/
aws::graph::propositions: # Amazon Business Description
Amazon seeks to be Earth's most customer-centric company.
Amazon serves primary customer sets consisting of consumers, sellers, developers, enterprises, content creators, advertisers, and employees.
Amazon serves consumers through online stores.
Amazon serves consumers through physical stores.
Amazon focuses on selection, price, and convenience for consumers.
Amazon offers programs that enable sellers to grow their businesses.
Amazon offers programs that enable sellers to sell their products in Amazon stores.
Amazon offers programs that enable sellers to fulfill orders using Amazon services.
Amazon offers programs that allow authors to publish and sell content.
Amazon offers programs that allow independent publishers to publish and sell content.
Amazon offers programs that allow musicians to publish and sell content.
Amazon offers programs that allow filmmakers to publish and sell content.
Amazon offers programs that allow Twitch streamers to publish and sell content.
Amazon offers programs that allow skill developers to publish and sell content.
Amazon offers programs that allow app developers to publish and sell content.
Amazon serves developers through Amazon Web Services (AWS).
Amazon serves enterprises of all sizes through Amazon Web Services (AWS).
Amazon Web Services (AWS) offers a broad set of on-demand technology services.
Amazon Web Services (AWS) offers compute services.
Amazon Web Services (AWS) offers storage services.
Amazon Web Services (AWS) offers database services.
Amazon Web Services (AWS) offers analytics services.
Amazon Web Services (AWS) offers machine learning services.
Amazon Web Services (AWS) offers other services.

metadata.header_path: /FORM 10-K/Part II/Item 8 - Financial Statements and Supplementary Data/NOTES TO CONSOLIDATED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS/

/FORM 10-K/Part II/Item 8 - Financial Statements and Supplementary Data/NOTES TO CONSOLIDATED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS/Note 1 â€” DESCRIPTION OF BUSINESS, ACCOUNTING POLICIES, AND SUPPLEMENTAL DISCLOSURES/

text:
###### Description of Business

We seek to be Earthâ€™s most customer-centric company. In each of our segments, we serve our primary customer sets, consisting of consumers, sellers, developers, enterprises, content creators, advertisers, and employees. We serve consumers through our online and physical stores and focus on selection, price, and convenience. We offer programs that enable sellers to grow their businesses, sell their products in our stores, and fulfill orders using our services, and programs that allow authors, independent publishers, musicians, filmmakers, Twitch streamers, skill and app developers, and others to publish and sell content. We serve developers and enterprises of all sizes through AWS, which offers a broad set of on-demand technology services, including compute, storage, database, analytics, and machine learning, and other services.
